name: Cowboyvania
description:
Cowboyvania is my entry to the 9 Day Metroidvania game jam. You play as a sheriff who has been wrongly imprisoned in his own jail. Help in escape.

Unfortunately, I didn't get nearly as much done on this jam as I originally intended. Once you've found the revolver, you've basically reached the end of the content (although there are a couple health pickups you can still get).

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys

Jump: X

Punch: Z

Shoot: A (when unlocked)

Dynamite: S (when unlocked)

Credits:

Programming, Design, Art, Sound: Michael Stroud

Additional Art: Aaron Hayter
